SEARCH

Class CCMSuggestionManager

java.lang.Object
FeedbackManager
CCMSuggestionManager
public class CCMSuggestionManager extends FeedbackManager
The CCMSuggestionManager class extends FeedbackManager and provides functionality specific to handling suggestions made by Camp Committee Members (CCM). CCMs can submit, delete, edit, and view their suggestions using this manager. The class utilizes a SuggestionList to store and manage suggestions made by users. It interacts with a CampList and a Student to identify the relevant camp for submitting suggestions. Suggestion details, such as content, status, and suggestion ID, are managed and displayed.

Usage Example:

 
 CampList campList = new CampList();
 SuggestionList suggestionList = new SuggestionList();
 CCMSuggestionManager suggestionManager = new CCMSuggestionManager(suggestionList);
 suggestionManager.submit(student, campList);
 suggestionManager.view(student);
 suggestionManager.delete(student);
 suggestionManager.edit(student);

    • CCMSuggestionManager

  • Method Details

    • submit

      public void submit(Student student, CampList campList)
      Allows a Camp Committee Member (CCM) to submit a suggestion for a specific camp. The CCM is prompted to enter the suggestion content, and the suggestion is added to the suggestion list. Points are awarded to the student for submitting a suggestion.
      Specified by:
      submit in class FeedbackManager
      Parameters:
      student - The Student submitting the suggestion.
      campList - The CampList used to identify the relevant camp for the suggestion.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - for invalid suggestion inputs and ensures proper user guidance
      NullPointerException - by validating the camp object before accessing its properties.

    • delete

      public void delete(Student student)
      Allows a Camp Committee Member (CCM) to delete a previously submitted suggestion. The CCM is prompted to enter the suggestion ID to be deleted, and the corresponding suggestion is removed from the list. Points are deducted from the student for deleting a suggestion.
      Specified by:
      delete in class FeedbackManager
      Parameters:
      student - The Student attempting to delete a suggestion.
      Throws:
      InputMismatchException - handles user input for deleting suggestions, checks for the validity of the entered suggestion ID, ensures the user's ownership of the suggestion, and verifies whether the suggestion has been processed before allowing deletion

    • edit

      public void edit(Student student)
      Allows a Camp Committee Member (CCM) to edit the content of a previously submitted suggestion. The CCM is prompted to enter the suggestion ID and the new content for the suggestion. Editing is allowed only if the suggestion has not been processed.
      Specified by:
      edit in class FeedbackManager
      Parameters:
      student - The Student attempting to edit a suggestion.
      Throws:
      InputMismatchException - for invalid input when reading the suggestion ID.

    • view

      public void view(Student student)
      Displays the suggestions made by a specific Camp Committee Member (CCM). The CCM's suggestions, along with their IDs, content, and processing status, are printed.
      Specified by:
      view in class FeedbackManager
      Parameters:
      student - The Student for whom suggestions are to be displayed.
